services.description: Specializes in the diagnosis and treatment of all heart conditions, from common issues like hypertension and arrhythmias to complex diseases such as heart failure and valvular heart disease.
Offers comprehensive assessment, counseling, and treatment for a wide range of mental health conditions, including anxiety, depression, and post-traumatic stress disorder.
Provides safe and effective anesthesia and pain management for patients undergoing surgery and other medical procedures.
Specializes in the diagnosis and treatment of respiratory diseases such as asthma, pneumonia, and chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD).
Implements infection prevention and control measures throughout the hospital to ensure the safety of patients and healthcare workers.
